Text: Forget this torrent: what you really need is the Kino restoration which is finally available on TPB and runs about half an hour longer than all other versions and includes all of the color-tinting removed from most other prints.  The only drawback is that it is a direct DVD rip so it's a VIDEO_TS file at 7.36 GB.  It will take a while to download and then can only be burnt onto a double-layer DVD, but believe me: it's well worth it!
